title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: Currently, when the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is not having any effect in the new PDF emitter. This bug needs to be fixed.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not hide or remove the element from the rendered PDF in the new PDF emitter.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', the element should be hidden or removed from the rendered PDF in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the PDF emitter in the application.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Render the PDF.

Expected result: The item should not be visible in the rendered PDF.

Actual result: The item remains visible in the rendered PDF.
